section.para: Zend_Validate_LessThan allows you to validate if a given value is less than a maximum border value. It is the cousine of Zend_Validate_GreaterThan.

note.para: It should be noted that Zend_Validate_LessThan supports only the validation of numbers. Strings or dates can not be validated with this validator.

section.para: The following options are supported for Zend_Validate_LessThan:

listitem.para: max: Sets the maximum allowed value.
